attributes.action: Extend (Within legal frame work) jury responsibility.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The jury in trials should where appropriate and after verdict, be allowed to hear vicitims and/or relatives, causes and life effects if any, and should be allowed to plea for particular sentencing. 
This would make for a more balanced system, as jurors are chosen from a list of people at random, what are the chances of all 12 or 15 people coming together to hear a similar case?
The down side for the criminal is he only knows the maximum permitted in law!
